text: Te, kotoryye uverovali, budut zhit' v etikh rayskikh sadakh v blagodushii; ved' My ochistili ikh serdtsa ot nenavisti. Oni vse budut brat'yami, i budut oni v rayu vossedat' na lozhakh, obrativshis' drug k drugu s siyayushchimi ot schast'ya i lyubvi litsami, ne dumaya nichego durnogo drug o druge
